meanings.sent1: She is an indy thinker who likes to do things on her own.
meanings.sent2: The company prides itself on being indy and not relying on others.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its indy spirit by refusing to be carried and walking on its own.
meanings.sent4: The lone wolf symbolizes the indy nature of those who prefer solitude.
meanings.sent5: The young artist's indy style set her apart from the mainstream.

meanings.sent1: I visited Indy last summer and enjoyed exploring the city.
meanings.sent2: Indy is known for its famous racetrack, the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to take a road trip to Indy for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: In Indy, you can find a variety of delicious food from different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The museum in Indy showcases the history and culture of the region.

meanings.sent1: She prefers indy music over mainstream pop songs.
meanings.sent2: The film festival featured many indie movies from up-and-coming directors.
meanings.sent3: The bookstore had a section dedicated to indie authors and their works.
meanings.sent4: The indie fashion designer created unique pieces that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The indie coffee shop had a cozy atmosphere and locally sourced beans.
